thread.title: Kohler Barnard pleads guilty, enters into sentence agreement
thread.title_full: Kohler Barnard pleads guilty, enters into sentence agreement | News24

author: news24.com
title: Kohler Barnard pleads guilty, enters into sentence agreement
text:
Embattled MP Dianne Kohler Barnard pleaded guilty and entered into a plea and sentence agreement this morning.
“The panel has come to a finding, which takes the form of a recommendation that goes to Fedex [the DA federal executive] for consideration,” the party’s federal legal commission chairperson, Glynnis Breytenbach, said.
She declined to reveal the sanction that was recommended.
